text: I am commanded by the King to be brief
and since I am the Kings obedient
subject brief I will be I die his
Majesty's good servant but God's first I
forgive you right readily be not afraid
of your office you send me to go on your
bet is short of that Saddam he will not
refuse when it is so blind to go to him
Thomas More's head
tightest gate for a month then his
daughter Margaret removed it and kept it
till her death Cromwell was beheaded for
high treason
five years after more the archbishop was
burned at the stake the Duke of Norfolk
should have been executed for high
treason but the king died of syphilis
the night before Richard rich became
Chancellor of England and died in his
bed
[Music]
